Introduction

1 MINUTE EXERCISE

In this workshop you will learn how to promote your application code from Development to Production.

  • Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) with OpenShift Pipelines

  • GitOps workflow with Argo CD

In addition, you will learn how to enable Service Mesh capability on OpenShift for monitoring your applications and how to use it for advanced deployment techniques.

Let’s start the workshop with the discovery of OpenShift and OpenShift Dev Spaces.

Modern Application Development Roadshow - Dev Track 2. Get your Developer Workspace
